natter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to talk for a long time about unimportant things
natter.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Sometimes she would pick up the telephone and natter to Charles.

natter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the act of talking about unimportant things
natter.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: We sat down and had a natter and a cup of tea.
